room_title: Escape room "The Magical Forest" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: We tried out their new kid escape room and it was awesome!  They all worked so hard together and figured out the challenge!  We will definitely be back to play in some of their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Magical Forest" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: Amazing place, amazing experience, amazing place and to top it all Amazing employees. They are very understanding and helpful. My daughter and her friends had a blast and she will always remember this! Thank you so much for all of your efforts to make this escape experience really a memorable one. God bless and more power to you!

room_title: Escape room "The Magical Forest" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
review: This was an amazing experience for our group of kids. We had kids ranging in age from 8-13 and we rocked the Magical Forest. Challenging at times but we made it out without any clues. Would definitely recommend this  room/company. Great first escape room for kids.
